title: Epic: Beadsflow (generic beads autopilot + session runner)
description:
Create a standalone repo/package (beadsflow) that provides a generic, repo-local Beads automation loop (implement+review) and an optional zellij session runner.

- Works with per-repo Beads DB (no ops-meta dependency)
- Configurable implementer/reviewer (Codex/Claude)
- Designed to be invoked via uv/uvx
- Minimal human-in-the-loop, but safe defaults
acceptance_criteria: - Can run beadsflow against a repo-local Beads DB\n- Can run multiple epics concurrently (one epic per workspace/session)\n- Clear docs for setup + running + stopping
